addrole.name: addrole
addrole.desc: Add a role to an user on your server, in order to assign a role the bot role must be above the others

ban.name: ban
ban.desc: Ban an user from the server
ban.example: $ban @myUsername#0632 He did not respect the rules

deletemsg.name: deletemsg
deletemsg.desc: Delete an amount of messages, the number must be between 2 and 100

kick.name: kick
kick.desc: Kick an user from the server.
kick.example: $kick @myUsername#0632 He did not respect the rules

mute.name: mute
mute.desc: Mute an user for a specific amount of time, you have to create a new role called mute to make the command work.

removerole.name: removerole
removerole.desc: Remove a role of an user

setbotname.name: setbotname
setbotname.desc: Set a name for the bot

setbotstatus.name: setbotstatus
setbotstatus.usage: $setbotstatus [status] you can choose the following strings: online, idle, invisible, dnd (do not disturb)

csgo.name: csgo
csgo.desc: Get csgo stats for an user given by STEAMID64

csgofloat.name: csgofloat
csgofloat.desc: Get informations about a skin or a weapon

lolcprot.name: lolcprot
lolcprot.desc: Display the current champion rotation in EU West

loltopfive.name: loltopfive
loltopfive.desc: Display the top 5 played champions of a summoner, based on the SummonerID. You can find your SummonerID at http://www.lolking.net/

help.name: help
help.desc: Display the list of commands if you just type $help or if you type $help commandName display the current command info

serverinvite.name: serverinvite
serverinvite.desc: Get an invite for the server, but you must type the channelID to get the command work

deletetrack.name: deletetrack
deletetrack.desc: Delete a song from the queue, if you want know your current queue, just type $queue and you will get the songs

joinchannel.name: joinchannel
joinchannel.desc: Make the bot join in a voice channel, you must be in a voice channel

playtube.name: playtube
playtube.desc: Play an youtube video, each time you use this command correctly, the youtube video will be added to the queue

stop.name: stop
stop.desc: The bot leaves the voice channel

volume.name: volume
volume.desc: Set bot volume in the voice channel, you must type a number betweem 0-200

ytsearch.name: ytsearch
ytsearch.desc: Search for a song on youtube, then type a number betweem 1-20 (or less) from a list of 20 songs
ytsearch.example: $ytsearch [His Name Is Pewdiepie] hit enter, then type a number

distance.name: distance
distance.desc: Get the distance between the sets of coordinates

google.name: google
google.desc: Get 3 search queries from Google Custom Search, you need to provide in the json file called googleConfig, your Custom Search Api Key and you CX

randomcolor.name: randomcolor
randomcolor.desc: Generates a random hex color with preview

setafk.name: setafk
setafk.desc: Set your status afk or notafk

weather.name: weather
weather.desc: Get the forecast information for a location
